name: SkyLogicSystem
short_description: The core part of next generation of Cloud Application Platform (SkyLogicSystem Platform). With hybrid develop & runtime engine enables developers to quickly deliver applications that help businesses be more responsive, flexible, low development and maintenance cost. This application server using for deploy SkyLogic application by working on top of J2EE (Java 2 Enterprise Edition) application server. Current version support both open source and commercial J2EE application server. This application server is free for develop, deploy and production no any license cost.
